page.title: 12LOCAL AMENITIES
page.content: SHOPS. There are two shops in the village_Atkinsons and Steers.They sell food,sweets,wool and drinks etc.As well as the Post Office there is a coffee bar at Atkinsons. They serve morning coffee and afternoon teas. RESTRAUNTS.There are three restraunts in the village.The Gilded Apple serves lunch and dinner.The George Hotel provides barmeals at lunch time.The Waverley Hotel caters for bed and breakfast visitors.Just outside the village Orton Hall has a tea room which is open during the summer months. TRAVELLING VANS. There are five vans that come into the village each week. They are the butcher,baker,grocer, fruit & veg man and the fishman.The postman and the milkman come into the village every day of the week except Sundays.
